FilterFoundry plugin for Photoshop

Copyright 2003-2019 Toby Thain, toby@telegraphics.com.au

Filter Foundry is a compatible replacement for Adobe Filter Factory. For information about how to use the Filter Factory-compatible interface, see The Filter Factory Programming Guide. Several example effects come with Filter Factory.

Compatibility

  • Tested with Photoshop 3.0 through CS6 on Power Mac (OS X, Classic, OS 9 and earlier), 68K Mac and Windows.
  • IrfanView 4.0 - Make sure you read the IrfanView documentation on how to load and run Adobe .8bf filters.
  • JASC PSP 9, Corel's Paint Shop Pro XI - are compatible.
  • The Gimp 2.2 with PSPI.exe extension (to run Photoshop .8bf files) is compatible with Filter Foundry 1.7.

Please note the following:

  • Trig functions use the Mac Filter Factory definition, a range of -1024..+1024 (rather than Windows FF's -512..+512). This is likely to be a user preference in future.
  • The 68K Macintosh build requires 68020 or later CPU and FPU.
